text.config.unforgivingvoid.title: Unforgiving Void Config
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.trigg: The distance below world bottom which Unforgiving Void
should send the player to the target dimension at.
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.dropO: Drop obsidian for the player when they appear in the target dimension.
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.fireR: How many seconds the player should get
fire resistance for when they appear in the target dimension.
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.slowF: How many seconds the player should get
slow falling for when they appear in the target dimension.
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.horiz: Put the player up to this far away horizontally from their target spawnpoint.
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.targe: Which dimension should the player be sent to from the Void?
Join a Singleplayer world before editing this for more options
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.addCu: Choose a dimension ID then save
Join a Singleplayer world before editing this for more options
text.config.unforgivingvoid.option.delet: WILL BE REMOVED IF THIS IS TRUE/YES!
